items.sentence: Where were you? Everyone was looking for you.
Would you have Tom come to my office, please?
Tom wanted Mary to learn how to speak French.
Tom wants to spend more time with his family.
Tom was able to solve the problem by himself.
Please forgive me for forgetting to call you.
Please keep your cynical remarks to yourself.
Please remind me to mail the report tomorrow.
Please tell Tom he can come back after lunch.
Robots will become more common in the future.
I wish Mary didn\'t already have a boyfriend.
Why don\'t we go ahead and start the meeting?
Why don\'t we go and see Tom in the hospital?
Why don\'t we see if Tom wants to go with us?
Why don\'t you come clean and tell the truth?
Why don\'t you go on home and get some sleep?
I don\'t know what I\'m going to do with Tom.
Trying to do such a thing is a waste of time.
Was Tom able to find what he was looking for?
Would you like go out for a drink after work?
